attributes.action: Take action against cut backs to the cancer drug fund
attributes.background: 32yr old with 5 children and the drugs I was going to start as now been cut .less time with my babies

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107548

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
